name: GPTSnake
description:
This is a version of Snake, but the code is written entirely by ChatGPT. I created an index.html and a game.js file, copy and pasted and uploaded to itch.io.

No code was modified in the process.

Note that you are unable to restart the game without refreshing the entire page, I tried specifying this feature to ChatGPT a couple of times, but it never returned a working version.
